data.eml:eml: Notes on some Western Palaearctic Xantholinini (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae). 181 ° contribution to the knowledge of the Staphylinidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bordoni, Arnaldo (2007): Notes on some Western Palaearctic Xantholinini (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae). 181 ° contribution to the knowledge of the Staphylinidae. Zootaxa 1431: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175789
